item.title: WIP - Template of orangeness
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

It’s nice I guess. I’ve just seen the exact same thing at least 50 or so times. Really, why can’t anyone do anything original. I know it’s the ‘style’ but I see this like every damn time I look at someones blog, or at some Private Server site.

But anyways, it’s good. And since it is a work in progress I probably will change my mind about this after I see the finished product. One suggestion I’ll make is the buttons, try something different. Don’t emboss, gloss. And the color contrast is too great. I would change the header a bit. Like at the top it’s not done right, maybe some sort of stroke would help.

The gradient in the header is to bold, I can see the reverse right there in the center. Try changing the ellipse gradient to better hide that. Oh, back to the buttons, Black goes good with anything you know. If you put some black and elaborated it a bit throughout the site. It could come off as very sleek.

About the Header, I’d get rid of the little person and the bubble, work on the text some more, it looks like you copied a gloss text tut. Maybe put a special logo to the left of the text. Other than what I’ve said I really don’t see anything else wrong with it. Except a Navigation box.

You have this large News box, it just doesn’t sit well, I’d put some kind of navigational box to the left, maybe a poll, Board Stats, and a Picture of the week. Just some thoughts. Anyways, I’d give it a 8.8/10.

Read full topic
